QuestData.Title: Sowing a Solution
QuestData.Description: Based on what you've brought me, I think we may have a solution. I've imbued the lashvine seeds with healing energies.$B$BSimple contact with these should imbue the creatures here with enough energy to force out the corrupted influence.$B$BGo and attempt to heal the mutated raptors and plainstriders by sprinkling the seeds on them, and report the results back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Soothing Seeds on 6 Deviate Terrortooths or Deviate Plainstriders and observe the results.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh dear. It seems the forces at work here are a bit difficult to control...$B$BPlease, don't bother Naralex with this. It will only upset him.
